title: Ethical Leadership and Organizational Learning Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical concepts and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: A course integrating ethical decision-making and team collaboration into mathematical problem-solving processes to strengthen organizational learning capabilities, with mobile-based microlearning for flexible learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical problem-solving processes within a team according to ethical leadership principles.
Learners can distinguish and apply "exploitative learning" strategies for efficiently improving given mathematical problems and "explorative learning" strategies for seeking innovative solutions.
Learners can propose solutions to resolve ethical conflicts during team-based math project execution using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
